actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study of a Pacific Coast Bike Trail.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the National Trails System Act, a feasibility study of a Pacific Coast Bike Trail, which would extend from Canada to Mexico and follow as nearly as possible the outline of the Pacific Ocean. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1244)

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study of a Pacific Coast Bike Trail.
